Reviews.Title: “This was--hands down-- the worst Motel 6 EVER.”

Reviews.Content: agree 100 husband gotten phoenix spend night signed apartment paperwork morning whenever travel check availability motel 6 lay head night worst motel 6 weve stayed outside motel run unkept unclean building sidewalks filthy trash stuck food whatever else nightmare unclean floor looked seen vacuum months dirt crumbs debris trash baseboards walls hair trash sink floor etc supposed nonsmoking ashtrays burn holes carpet bedspread etc weird odor clean husband insisted stay cheap sleep car parking lot creepy strangers domestic disputes luckily sheet pillow own car managed sleep 3 hours getting comfortable hear slot door door pushed latch covering door couldnt woke supposed left followed rude phone call front desk information name didnt registered wed 2pm afternoon call apologize inconvenience please stay else extra dollars definitely worth peace mind
